sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Field, ErrorMessage } from 'formik';
import { Button } from '@mui/material';

const Step1 = ({ values, nextStep }) => {
    return (
        <Container maxWidth="sm">
            <Box sx={{ bgcolor: 'green' }}>
                <Typography variant="body1" gutterBottom>
                    In this assessment, we will ask you a series of questions to determine how well your organization is doing with Agile.
                </Typography>
                <Divider />
            </Box>
            <Box sx={{ bgcolor: '#cfe8fc' }}>
                <Divider />
                <form>
                    <FormGroup>
                        <Stack spacing={2}>
                            <Item>
                                <FormControlLabel control={<Checkbox />} label="Delivering working, tested software every 3 weeks or less" />
                            </Item>
                            <Item>
                                <FormControlLabel control={<Checkbox />} label="Delivering what the business needs most" />
                            </Item>
                            <Item>
                                <FormControlLabel control={<Checkbox />} label="Process is continuously improving" />
                            </Item>
                        </Stack>
                    </FormGroup>
                    <Button variant="contained" color="primary" type="submit" onClick={prevStep}>
                        Previous Step
                    </Button>
                    <Button variant="contained" color="primary" type="submit" onClick={nextStep}>
                        Next Step
                    </Button>
                </form>
            </Box>
        </Container>
    );
};

export default Step1;
